body:
Looks like it is chopping off the correct Kube prefix, maybe because of bash 4.0isms.

```
hack/verify-golint.sh
cannot find package "_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cluster/addons/fluentd-elasticsearch/es-image/*.go" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cluster/addons/fluentd-elasticsearch/es-image/*.go (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/clayton/projects/tempgo/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cluster/addons/fluentd-elasticsearch/es-image/*.go (from $GOPATH)
cannot find package "_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cluster/images/etcd/attachlease/*.go" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cluster/images/etcd/attachlease/*.go (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/clayton/projects/tempgo/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cluster/images/etcd/attachlease/*.go (from $GOPATH)
cannot find package "_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/gendocs/*.go" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/gendocs/*.go (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/clayton/projects/tempgo/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/gendocs/*.go (from $GOPATH)
cannot find package "_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genkubedocs/*.go" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genkubedocs/*.go (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/clayton/projects/tempgo/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genkubedocs/*.go (from $GOPATH)
cannot find package "_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genman/*.go" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genman/*.go (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/clayton/projects/tempgo/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genman/*.go (from $GOPATH)
cannot find package "_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genswaggertypedocs/*.go" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/_/Users/clayton/projects/go/src/cmd/genswaggertypedocs/*.go (from $GOROOT)
```
title: hack/verify-golint.sh fails on a Mac
